I used ffmpeg to solve the problem with video seek:

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vcodec copy -acodec copy output.mp4

Took 30 seconds.

Forgot, to make those work, you can either load them through VLC while watching the movie, or you will have to rename them to "A.Good.Day.to.Die.Hard.2013.720p.BluRay.x264.YIFY.srt" (obviously without the quotes) and then place them in the same folder as the movie before burning/loading up. You will have to remove/replace the srt that came with this torrent.
